Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to testimonies in parole hearings
Summary: Requires that all comments and testimony made by a third party either in support or opposition in a parole hearing shall be considered when coming to a decision; adds provisions relating to confidentiality of victim statements.
LawCode: Amd ยง259-i, Exec L; amd ยง440.50, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to statements to the state board of parole
